mapper.select:
select a.net_id,a.net_town,a.net_village,a.net_iptype,a.net_type,a.net_equ,a.net_pc,a.net_vmeet,a.net_monit,a.net_vlan,a.net_surp ,a.net_band,a.net_vpn,a.net_num,a.net_exchange,a.net_baklink,a.net_baksurp from t_ass_net a where 1=1
order by a.net_id

select t.ass_id,left(t.type_code,2) as ass_type1,left(t.type_code,3) as ass_type2,t.type_code as ass_type3,t.ass_contr ,t.ass_no,t.ass_name,t.ass_catg,t.ass_tag,t.ass_model,t.ass_factoryno,t.ass_manufacturer,t.ass_supplier,t.ass_unit,t.ass_num ,t.ass_cost,t.purchase_date,t.ass_dept,t.ass_owner,t.ass_addr,t.ass_state,t.ass_remark from t_ass_main t left join t_ass_offic a on t.ass_id=a.ass_id left join t_ass_consp b on t.ass_id=b.ass_id left join t_ass_car c on t.ass_id=c.ass_id left join t_ass_server d on t.ass_id=d.ass_id left join t_ass_camera e on t.ass_id=e.ass_id left join t_ass_gate f on t.ass_id=f.ass_id left join t_ass_instr g on t.ass_id=g.ass_id where t.ass_id = #{assId}

select dict_code as ass_type,dict_value as ass_name from t_sys_dict where dict_unit='ass' and dict_field='type_code' and dict_code like '%' #{type} '%' and dict_order=(select dict_order+1 from t_sys_dict where dict_unit='ass' and dict_field='type_code' and dict_code=#{type})
